Package com.lopl.melody.commands.music

Class Join

java.lang.Object
com.lopl.melody.slash.SlashCommand
com.lopl.melody.commands.music.Join
public class Join
extends SlashCommand
Join Command General functionality is defined here When entering a join command in a guild chat, the bot will try to join your current voice channel

  • Constructor Details

    • Join

      public Join()
      Constructor for a Join Command Object. This is instantiated when building the Command Handler or for temporary operations

      SlashCommand.name The name of the command. The string you have to type after the '/'. i.e. /join SlashCommand.category The category of the command. Commands will be sorted by that SlashCommand.help The help message, in case someone types /help [command] SlashCommand.description This description will be shown together with the command name in the command preview

  • Method Details

    • execute

      protected void execute​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.interaction.SlashCommandEvent event)
      This will fire whenever a user enters /join in a guild textchannel. If the requesting member is in a vc and the command is correct, the bot will join you.
      Specified by:
      execute in class SlashCommand
      Parameters:
      event - all the event data

    • connectReturnEmbed

      public java.util.List<net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.MessageEmbed> connectReturnEmbed​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.interaction.SlashCommandEvent event)
      This function can be call from other Slash Functions. It will connect the bot to your voicechannel and return a fitting MessageEmbed.
      Parameters:
      event - the calling SlashCommandEvent
      Returns:
      a fitting MessageEmbed

    • connect

      public void connect​(@Nonnull net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild guild, @Nullable net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Member member, @Nullable net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.TextChannel textChannel)
      This function can be called from anywhere. It will connect the bot to a voicechannel and send a fitting message to the provided TextChannel
      Parameters:
      guild - the current guild
      member - the requester
      textChannel - the TextChannel for a Message. Can be null

    • getJoinMessageEmbed

      @Nullable private net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.MessageEmbed getJoinMessageEmbed​(@Nullable net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.VoiceChannel oldChannel, @Nonnull net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.VoiceChannel newChannel)
      Returns a MessageEmbed with a descriptive content, how the bot behaved, while joining your VoiceChannel.
      Parameters:
      newChannel - The joining Channel
      oldChannel - The previous channel, null if not connected
      Returns:
      a fitting MessageEmbed

    • createJoinMessageEmbed

      @Nonnull private net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.MessageEmbed createJoinMessageEmbed​(@Nullable net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.VoiceChannel oldChannel, @Nonnull net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.VoiceChannel newChannel)
      Returns a MessageEmbed with a descriptive content, how the bot behaved, while joining your VoiceChannel. Also returns a embed when nothing happened
      Parameters:
      newChannel - The joining Channel
      oldChannel - The previous channel, null if not connected
      Returns:
      a fitting MessageEmbed
